resources.description: This paper investigates the problem of asymptotic stability for discrete-time linear systems with quantized state feedback over channel model. We discussed the controller design combined with channel model and quantizer design. The sufficient conditions of asymptotic stability for those systems are presented and the method of controller design is also obtained. Finally, the effectiveness of the proposed conditions is demonstrated by a numerical example.
resources.name: Asymptotic Stability Problem for Discrete-time Systems with Quantized Feedback over Channel Model

name: asymptotic-stability-problem-for-discrete-time-systems-with-quantized-feedback-over-channel-model

Finally, the effectiveness of the proposed conditions is demonstrated by a numerical example.  http://www.sj-ce.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=96
title: Asymptotic Stability Problem for Discrete-time Systems with Quantized Feedback over Channel Model
